comment: Last week this question was for BJP . This week for Congress . Spot the Missing Person <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Last week this question was for BJP . This week for Congress . Spot the Missing Person <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (q / question-01
            :ARG2 (p / political-party
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "BJP"))
            :time (w / week
                  :mod (l / last))
            :mod (t / this))
      :snt2 (q2 / question-01
            :ARG2 (p2 / political-party
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Congress"))
            :time (w2 / week
                  :mod (t2 / this)))
      :snt3 (s / spot-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p3 / person
                  :ARG1-of (m2 / miss-01))))

comment: Congress is gone case . No life left . They were gifted a mass movement on a platter . All they had to do was show up . Even that , they couldn't manage . The fixation with ' gandhi ' is cringe inducing .
amr:
# ::snt Congress is gone case . No life left . They were gifted a mass movement on a platter . All they had to do was show up . Even that , they couldn't manage . The fixation with ' gandhi ' is cringe inducing .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / go-02
            :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Congress"))
            :mod (c / case))
      :snt2 (l / leave-17
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (l2 / life))
      :snt3 (g3 / gift-01
            :ARG1 (m2 / movement-07
                  :mod (m3 / mass))
            :ARG2 (t / they)
            :manner (p / platter))
      :snt4 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 t
            :ARG2 (s / show-up-02
                  :ARG1 t)
            :mod (a / all))
      :snt5 (p2 / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (m4 / manage-02
                  :ARG0 t)
            :mod (e / even))
      :snt6 (ii / induce-01
            :ARG0 (o2 / obsess-01
                  :ARG1 (g4 / gandhi))
            :ARG2 (c2 / cringe-01)))

comment: Don't vote Congress . Vote BJP or anyone else . Pls . Don't vote Congress .
amr:
# ::snt Don't vote Congress . Vote BJP or anyone else . Pls . Don't vote Congress .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (v / vote-01
            :mode imperative
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (p / political-party
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Congress")))
      :snt2 (v2 / vote-01
            :mode imperative
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (p2 / political-party
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "BJP"))
                  :op2 (a / anyone
                        :mod (e / else))))
      :snt3 (p3 / political-party
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Pls"))
      :snt4 (v3 / vote-01
            :mode imperative
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (y3 / you)
            :ARG1 (p4 / political-party
                  :name (n4 / name
                        :op1 "Congress"))))
